fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Research (Night): Investigate someone to find about their exact action in the previous night phase.
-Discover (Night): Investigate a dead body to learn about every action that targeted it during the night that it died. Targeting someone who was killed at day will get you results of the night before they were killed.
-Publish (Night): Anonymously publish the results of your ability. Usable at the same time as Research and Discover, you will be granted extra time between gaining your results and the day beginning to switch to Forged Publish.
-Forged Publish (Night): Anonymously publish whatever the fuck you want. Usable at the same time as Research and Discover, you will be granted extra time between gaining your results and the day beginning to switch to Publish, if you desire.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You can only switch between the Publish abilities. Once abilities are processed, you cannot switch between Research and Discover.
